# Preferences

## Communication
- Prefer async over sync when possible
- Direct feedback is appreciated
- No need for pleasantries in code reviews

## Code Style
- TypeScript strict mode always
- Prefer composition over inheritance
- Small, focused functions

## Tools
- Editor: VS Code with Vim keybindings
- Terminal: iTerm2 with zsh
- AI Assistant: OpenCode / Claude

## Working Hours
- Most productive: 9am - 12pm
- Avoid meetings before 10am
- Deep work blocks on Wednesday afternoons
